import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './appform.css'; // This file will contain the necessary CSS import Footer from './footer'; import Modal from 'react-modal'; import { MapContainer, TileLayer, Marker, Popup } from 'react-leaflet'; // Leaflet map const icon = L.icon({ iconUrl: 'src/to/pin.jpg', // Provide your custom marker icon path here iconSize: [25, 41], iconAnchor: [12, 41], popupAnchor: [0, -41], }); const Appform = () => { const [isMapVisible, setIsMapVisible] = useState(false); // State for map visibility const [location, setLocation] = useState(null); // Store location from map // Default location (e.g., centered on the Philippines) const defaultCenter = [12.8797, 121.7740]; // Handle checkbox toggle for showing or hiding map modal const handleCheckboxChange = () => { if (location) { // If location already selected, unselect it setLocation(null); setIsMapVisible(false); // Close the modal when unselecting location } else { // If no location is selected, show map modal setIsMapVisible(true); } }; // Handle location selection from map const handleLocationSelect = (selectedLocation) => { setLocation(selectedLocation); // Store selected location setIsMapVisible(false); // Close modal after selecting location }; return (
{/* Header Section */}

MSU-IIT National Multi-Purpose Cooperative

{/* Form Container */}

Loan Application Form

{/* Show the selected location in the textarea */} {location && (

); }; export default Appform;
